review: a brief shot of lynchian madness that feels like just the right amount of well everything the punishingly sparse color palette makes the backgrounds kind of hard to parse out which results in some delicious paranoia where youre not quite sure if youre seeing what you think youre seeing the narrative too is very satisfying growing from subtle to humorous to upsetting more or less linearly very nice 3 am laptop gaming
